metadata.name: I. SOUND OF WATER
metadata.description:
SOUND OF WATER is an artistic project extrapolated from the TWIN FLAME story.

Diving into icy waters bestows love and generates the sound of emotions. It destroys the monotonous passive soul that harmoniously accepts getting involved trusting in its most unconscious abilities.

UTILITY | The first buyer receives the work printed and signed with dedication in A3 format.
